author: stefanbratanov
content: Hi, noticed there were issues with relays accepting unknown pubkeys and the description of the `register_validator` endpoint currently accepts them. However, the spec of the builder accepts only pending and active validators https://ethereum.github.io/builder-specs/#/Builder/registerValidator . I modified an old PR I raised to reflect that in the beacon-API. Would be good if someone has a double check and review it. https://github.com/ethereum/beacon-APIs/pull/230

author: hiroyukinaito
content:
Hey, I'm a volunteer translator of Ethereum.org. Does execution_payload has execution_payload_header in its field? I'm wondering about the translation of Blocks page. 
If someone knows how to retrieve it, is it possible to get by infra API?
